name: garter stitch corner to corner blanket
notes:
a super-easy garter stitch knit blanket, the featured yarn helps this option look a lot more advanced than it is! stitched in self-striping bernat blanket perfect phasing, you'll focus on learning the knit and purl stitches while the yarn reveals gentle color transitions right before your eyes! it's a great first blanket project to impress your friends. whether a beginner or more advanced maker, this pattern is bound to become a favorite.

materials
bernat® blanket perfect phasing™ (10.5 oz/300 g; 220 yards/201 m)
fuchsia (43003) 4 balls or 767 yards/701 m

measurements
approx 54 x 60" \[137 x 152.5 cm]
